eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining.GNN

Class ContextTrainingExampleData

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining.GNN.ContextTrainingExampleData

  • public class ContextTrainingExampleData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a storage structure that organizes a list of TrainingExample data to be stored in the contextual ego network's contexts. It is indented to be used as a dynamically created instance on contexts (which are cross module components) by calling context.getOrCreateInstance(GNNNodeData.class) to either retrieve of create it.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Krasanakis

      • degrade

        public void degrade(double factor,
                    double removalThreshold)
        Calls the TrainingExample.degrade(double) operation for each TrainingExample in the data (e.g. to reduce all weights) and removes those that end up on a very small weight.
        Parameters:
        factor - The degrading factor passed on to the degrade operation.
        removalThreshold - The threshold weight under which training examples are removed.
        See Also:
        TrainingExample.getWeight()
